channel.title: HIV on Alan Yeung
channel.description: Recent content in HIV on Alan Yeung

item.title: Population-level effectiveness of a national HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis programme in MSM
item.description: The study evaluated Scotland’s national HIV PrEP programme in relation to PrEP uptake and associated population-level impact on HIV incidence among MSM.

item.title: Implementation of HIV PrEP in Scotland: First Year Report
item.description: This report looks at the first year of the HIV PrEP programme in Scotland, covering the period from July 2017 to June 2018.
